item.title: The Water Jug Riddle from Die Hard Movie
item.description:
You might have seen this riddle in Die Hard movie where Bruce Willis and Jackson have to diffuse a bomb by placing exactly 4-gallon water on a scale

You have a 3-gallon and a 5-gallon jug that you can fill multiple times from a pond of water. The problem is to measure exactly 4 gallons of water. How do you do it?

item.title: The 6s Math Puzzle
item.description:
This is a pure mathematical puzzle which evaluate your ability to solve maths equation. This is a great problem for building number sense.

The challenge is to make each below equation true using common mathematical operations. You cannot introduce any new digits (so the cube root ∛ is not allowed since it has a 3).

Hint: common mathematical operations are + - x / ! √

0 0 0 = 6    
1 1 1 = 6
2 2 2 = 6
3 3 3 = 6
4 4 4 = 6
5 5 5 = 6
6 6 6 = 6
7 7 7 = 6
8 8 8 = 6
9 9 9 = 6
